post.desc:
Actually, what's the basis for giving these three sleeveless tops anyway?

I guess Parsee has that look in the [**Jiny≈ç Meikan**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:Parsee_Whos_Who.png), but it's pretty possible that people have already been giving her the shirt before then. As for Jo'on, it's basically a given in fanarts, but I can't recall her ever taking off her jacket? ü§® And the same can be said for Raiko too, I suppose.
